meanings.definition: relating to or affected by autism
meanings.sent1: She has an autistic brother who loves routines.
meanings.sent2: The autistic child enjoys playing with puzzles.
meanings.sent3: The autistic student always brings a packed lunch to school.
meanings.sent4: His autistic view of the world is both unique and fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The therapist uses colorful visuals to engage the autistic children.

meanings.sent1: His autistic behaviors include repetitive hand movements.
meanings.sent2: The girl's autistic traits make her sensitive to loud noises.
meanings.sent3: The dog's autistic-like focus on chasing its tail is amusing.
meanings.sent4: The room was silent, filled with an autistic tension.
meanings.sent5: Her eyes had an autistic intensity that captivated those around her.

meanings.sent1: The autistic in the class excels in math.
meanings.sent2: An autistic may have difficulty with social interactions.
meanings.sent3: The group welcomed the new autistic with open arms.
meanings.sent4: The autistic's artwork spoke volumes about their inner world.
meanings.sent5: The autistic's smile lit up the room with pure joy.
